name: Dr. Stick
description:
Entry for "Edu game jam 1".

You are the doctor at a Stickman Fight Club. Your job is to take care of the wounded fighters by selecting the correct options of what to do in each case.

I wrote my thesis on something similar. So I made this game based on it. Hopefully, it will help.

This were my sources of information for the stuff I didn´t know:

https://www.heart.org/en/health-topics/cardiac-arrest

https://www.ufc.com/unified-rules-mixed-martial-arts

Other sources were my personal injuries and stories from doctors I know.
